snippet: Thais, who often mix superstition with a proclivity for fun, play the underground lottery with numbers gleaned from calamity, believing that disaster can beget good fortune.
abstract: Thais, who often mix superstition with a proclivity for fun, play country's underground lottery with numbers gleaned from calamity, believing that disaster can beget good fortune.
lead_paragraph: Thais, who often mix superstition with a proclivity for fun, play the underground lottery with numbers gleaned from calamity, believing that disaster can beget good fortune.

headline.seo: Deadly Car Crash? Time to Play the Thai Lottery
headline.main: Plane Crash? Murders? Time to Play Thai Lottery
headline.print_headline: Plane Crash? Murders? Time to Play Thai Lottery
